overview: During the reign of King Alboin, the peasant Bertoldo, sly and smart, manages to always get away with pranks and pleasantires with great mastery, and, even if his clumsy wife Marcolfa and their foolish son  Bertoldino always put him in trouble, his shrewdness and acumen save him from any unfortunate situation...
title: Bertoldo, Bertoldino, and Cacasenno
